attributes.action: Make It A Criminal Offence To Deny Access To A Fit Parent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to make it a criminal offence to deny access to one parent who is fit and capable of caring for the child. you read many stories where it has taken months, even years for a parent to gain access, and within that time the relationship between the parent and child has grown more distant as the days go on.
